c74object.name: zsa.flatness~
c74object.digest: Spectral flatness of key frequency bands.
c74object.description: Calculates the energy within frequency bands. For instance, if the freq attribute is set to 250, 500, 1000, 2000, 4000, zsa.flatness~ will output the a list of the energies between 0 and 250, 250 and 500, 500 and 1000...

method.name: (mouse)
method.description: Double-clicking on the object causes the Zsa Descriptors splash screen to appear. You'll find the version number and date there.

method.name: signal
method.description: If both signal inlets are connected, left signal inlet expects real values and right inlet expects imaginary values. If the left inlet is the only signal connected input, the signal is interpreted as the energy (you need to calculate it using cartopol~ or better zsa.energy~).

attribute.name: freq
attribute.description: List of the key frequency bands (default: 250, 500, 1000, 2000, 4000).
